LanguageData.RT_M48H_MediumTank_Blueprint.label: M48H Medium Tank
LanguageData.RT_M48H_MediumTank_Blueprint.description:
A medium MBT from a by-gone era, designed for use in jungle and mountainous encounters. After undergoing a modern refit, it was mass-produced for the televised "Iron fists." Equipped with a 105 mm cannon and two 7.62 mm machine gun armaments.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x2，Passenger x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel
